name: Two Way
description:
In each level, you start with two buttons. Your goal is to change these two buttons to match what you need to beat the level.

Use W,A,S,D to move. in every level, you start with two of the four buttons.

If you walk over a button, you can move in that direction. But the opposite direction of the button gets removed.

So for example, if you would move over to a W-button,you would gain the ability to move up, but lose the ability to move down.

Press R to restart the game.
